info.title: Navigate into an accordion panel in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
testPageDocument.getElementById('accordion1id').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate into the accordion panel.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate into the accordion panel.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name of region ('Personal Information') is conveyed
The ability to enter text into the input is conveyed
State of the input (required) is conveyed
